about_the_game:
Zombies are closing in, and there's no more time to hesitate!

Zombie Hunter: D-Day is a first-person shooter where you fight to survive the zombie apocalypse.

Use all the weapons in your arsenal to clear each new stage of zombies!

《 STORY 》





The zombie apocalypse comes out of nowhere.
The city, once brimming with life, is now a place of death,
filled with a thick fog and horrible shrieks.

You find yourself in cramped spaces, teeming with the undead.
Defend against the waves of zombies as your fight for survival begins!

《 GAMEPLAY 》





Flocks of fearless zombies

Use an arsenal of firearms to obliterate the ravenous undead!

If you do survive, you've only got a moment to breathe.
The next group of zombies is already swarming in!

Fend off the attacking waves

Over time, zombies become more powerful
as they continue to pour in!
Prepare for the running, crawling, ambushing horde!

An arsenal of weapons and upgrade options

With shotguns, rifles, machine guns, and more,

you're fully equipped with firearms for any situation!
Upgrade your equipment to become even more powerful!

Various game modes to enjoy

From your basic walkers to menacing zombie giants,
all sorts of trials await!
See how long you can last in Zombie Defense,
test out weapons in Weapons Experience, and more with
all the different game modes to enjoy!

©2023 CLE Games All Rights Reserved. Published by CFK.

highlighted.name: At last, the rescue team finds you.
Which felt far and far away…
You've been waiting for this moment…
The smell of blood is no longer disgusting
Leaving behind a mountain of corpses

name: Zombie Hunter: D-Day

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3570 CPU @ 3.40GHz
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6900 Series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3570 CPU @ 3.40GHz
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6900 Series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: The apocalypse is here. Zombies flood in from all sides. You have 80 days until the rescue team arrives. Your desperate struggle for survival begins now!
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Korean, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Vietnamese, Indonesian
